sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment } from "react"; export default function EventCard({ eachEvent, onBookingRequest }) { const yell = { color: "#FDFF00", fontWeight: "bold" }; return (
{eachEvent.eventname}
{eachEvent.details}

Location: {eachEvent.location}

Date: {eachEvent.date}

Ksh {eachEvent.fee}/=

Slots -- {eachEvent.slots}

 ); }
